Item.Message: Greetings commander, how was your flight in?
Welcome to your new assignment. You'll be using our new system of weapons to defend this outpost until further notice.
You can place turrets onto your tower and you can place traps onto the terrain.
Select the Machine Gun turret to place onto your tower.
Good, now place it onto your tower into the open slot.
Great. You can aim your turret by moving the crosshair around and fire by left-clicking. Try this now.
Good job. Try destroying that crate over there.
Well done, deselect the turret by right clicking.
You now have access to an Immolation trap. Select it now.
Place it on the terrain. Anywhere you like.
I've restocked your resources so that you can place a few more.
There's a wave of invaders incoming. Take them out before they reach the base of your tower.
Your Machine Gun has overheated. You can place another on your tower to use while the other cools down.
Well done, commander. You've defeated your first wave of invaders. Now is a good time to learn about Heavy projectiles.
First, let's remove the machine gun from the top slot of your tower. Do this by middle-clicking it.
You now have access to a Cannon turret, place one in the top slot.
Try firing a shot with your new Cannon turret.
See how the heavy cannon round falls to the ground? You need to anticipate where it's going to land.
The Cannon does splash damage. Try destroying these crates.
The cannon is very effective on groups of invaders.
There's another wave of invaders incoming. Take them out as you see fit.
You seem to have a passable grasp on the basics of using your weapons. I'm fairly confident you won't fail us immediately.
